sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The vindication of Colonel General Poyntz, against the false and malicious slanders secretly cast forth against him; as in a letter to a friend of his, and a servant to the state doth appear. Poyntz, Sydenham.
[8] p.
Printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Honorable House of Commons., London: : February 3. 1645. [i.e. 1646]
Dated and signed at end: Stoake, Jan. 20. 1645. .. Sydnham Poyntz. Wing has publication year 1645[6]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1646. Signatures: A⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The vindication of Colonel General Poyntz, against the false and malicious slanders secretly cast forth against him; as in a letter to a friend of his, and a servant to the state doth appear. Poyntz, Sydenham.
[8] p.
Printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Honorable House of Commons., London: : February 3. 1645. [i.e. 1646]
Dated and signed at end: Stoake, Jan. 20. 1645. .. Sydnham Poyntz. Wing has publication year 1645[6]; Thomason catalogue lists under 1646. Signatures: A⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
the Honorable House of Commons.
Edward Husband
